# f5distributedcloud_api_definition (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_api_definition` data source retrieves information about an existing API definition.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_api_definition" "example" {
  name      = "my-api-definition"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "swagger_url" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_api_definition.example.swagger_url
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the API definition to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the API definition is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the API definition.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the API definition.
- `swagger_url` (String) Swagger/OpenAPI specification URL.
